PluginData.Author: Blues Hailfire + Others
PluginData.Tooltip: Allows you to change the color/effect of a hydrogen thruster
PluginData.Description: Made By: Shinobi, Blues Hailfire, Foltast, Dercaixr Supports full RGB range for the thrusters color Custom VFX made specifically for the hydrogen thrusters, including: - AmberBurst - Maneuvering - Rainbow - Blueshift - ThunderDomn - Eridanus - HyperRX - SkyBurner - OPC Signature made by Dercaixr (OPC Thruster Exclusive) Server friendly Can be used on Nexus servers Highly efficient, can be used even on potato Setup via grid terminal
